entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 14.
